actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution calling upon the President to direct the United States Ambassador to the United Nations to use all means at his disposal to obtain action by the General Assembly terminating the observer status of the Palestine Liberation Organization.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the President should direct the Ambassador to the United Nations to use all means at his disposal to obtain action by the General Assembly removing the observer status of the Palestine Liberation Organization at the United Nations.

titles.title: A resolution calling upon the President to direct the United States Ambassador to the United Nations to use all means at his disposal to obtain action by the General Assembly terminating the observer status of the Palestine Liberation Organization.
